solution provided by the modelling component, 
refering to the NeOn OWL Ontology 
Metamodel defined in D1.1.1. 
Examples

Graphical representation of the solution 
provided, using examples and taking into 
account the UML Profile proposed in WP1. 
This could be optional.

componens (use, specialize, etc.).
